Text Area Field

<textarea class="form-control" placeholder="Text area"></textarea>

Use when...

Use a text field or text area to enter text information into a form.

Implementation

  • An asterisk is placed before the label as a visual cue that users can easily find with a quick scan. It is used to indicate mandatory fields.
  • The width of the text field is defined by the width of the containing division. See Layout section for using responsive column divisions.
  • Use the search glyphicon for the search input field. Use the close glyphicon in the search field to clear the contents.

See the Forms section for information on aligning fields on a form.
